Follow AGENTS.md guidance (root + scoped AGENTS.md).

## Repo at a glance
- Windows 11 portable distribution with embedded `python_standalone/`.
- Build directories: `builder/`, `builder-cu128/`, `builder-cu130/`.
- Default web UI port: **8188** (do not change).

## Where to look for rules
- Root `AGENTS.md` + scoped guidance in `.github/AGENTS.md`, `builder-cu130/AGENTS.md`, and `docs/AGENTS.md`.
- Path-specific templates: `.github/instructions/*.instructions.md`.
- Agent profiles: `.github/agents/*.agent.md`.
